skillTree.localised_description: The weight of every single insult, grievance, umbrage and ill-feeling, channelled into a single, crushing swing of the axe.
It's a crazy piece of acrobatics, for sure, but it might just work; if it does, the opponent has no chance.
This Lord belts out orders and can be heard even across a battlefield smothered in the grim noise of war.
To fire the forges and bring true craft and artifice back into the world.
A true Lord knows the Underway, his Dwarfhold and how to fight under the ground better than anyone.

effects.description:
Leadership: +6 when fighting against Skaven
	(Lord's army)

Leadership: +6 during subterranean siege battles
	(Lord's army)

Leadership: +6 during subterranean intercept battles
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: This stubborn Dwarf refuses to yield or tire, and ensures his followers are of the same ilk.
The endless courage of the Warrior God, directed to bolster this Dawi’s own reserves.
Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +20%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +35%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +50%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Although it was his early disasters that saw Malakai thrown out of the Engineers' Guild, he has continued to invent machines useful to Gotrek and his allies, with a far greater degree of success – fortunately!

effects.description:
Unlocks Hero recruitment: Master Engineer
	(all provinces)

skillTree.localised_description: It was his inventing prowess, or initial lack thereof, that forced Malakai to seek redemption through a glorious death in battle – something he pursues with the utmost seriousness!

effects.description:
Upkeep: -5% for Slayers, Giant Slayers, Slayer Pirates, Goblin Hewer and Doomseekers units
	(all armies factionwide)

Weapon strength: +8% for all Slayer units
	(all armies factionwide)

Missile strength: +8% for all Slayer units
	(all armies factionwide)

skillTree.localised_description: Few machines are irreparable by Malakai’s reckoning, for a true engineer never ceases to learn from their tinkering.

effects.description:
Casualty replenishment rate: +10% for Artillery and War Machine units
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +10% for Artillery and Flying War Machine units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Nobody can optimise a heavy gun or mortar the way Malakai can; when the Dawi rain fire down upon their enemies, his upgrades ensure there are no survivors.

target_if: Unit is Artillery or a War Machine

skillTree.localised_description: Through Malakai's genius, what once was mere design is brought to life in contraptions of hulking metal and endless firepower.

effects.description:
Construction cost: -10% for Military Support buildings
	(all provinces)

Construction time: -1 for Military Support buildings
	(all provinces)

skillTree.localised_description: "A little tweak here, a little adjustment there and… Boom! Hundreds of dead Goblins, as they should be."
"The enemy's fear; their blood spilt in the mud – these are the things that sustain me."
Death is always just a shot away.
Professional soldiery means never running out of ammo at the crucial moment.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
All Dwarfs despise the Greenskins, for the urki and grobi are the prime agents in the Times of Woe.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +7% when fighting against Greenskins
Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Greenskins

skillTree.localised_description: It truly is amazing how something so small can wreak so much explosive devastation.
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
What use armour, or even magical defences, against such powerful ordnance?
A clever arrangement of lenses makes the target seem just that bit closer.
Dwarfs are not fast, yet they will soldier on, always moving despite any hazards encountered.
The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.
When everything else fails, there is always studying the blade. (This skill can accept up to 20 Skill Points)
Wielding the shield is better than returning on it. (This skill can accept up to 20 Skill Points)
Many a tale, many a promise, and many a grave threat is scored into these fleshy drapes, detailing a life spent in the dogged pursuit of death…  and chiefly, their own!

effects.description:

Missile strength: +10% for Slayer Pirates and Goblin Hewer units

skillTree.localised_description: The deeds of this one's life are told through the many scars that adorn his timeworn and battle-aged skin.

skillTree.localised_description: When led by a Dwarf of sufficient calibre, a band of Slayers is many times more lethal – speeding to the heart of the action to cut it from the foe's still-screaming body!

skillTree.localised_description: A Lord and his az are never separated, for it is as much part of him as his beard.

skillTree.localised_description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.
This Dwarf spent time in the pits, gaining a Miner's intuition of the dangers and prey to be found in the dark.

Lords close to the powerful Masons' Guild will get discounts for labour and materials.

skillTree.localised_description: "All Dwarfs to me! We have grudges to settle - Grimnir demands it!"
Countless conflicts and a keen sense of awareness have made this Lord difficult to entrap.

skillTree.localised_description: A wise Lord will gather Engineers to his service, ensuring the Dwarfs maintain their technological edge.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +25% chance of wounding aggressors

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
This unit is a Slayer. Slayers can never have their Weapon Strength reduced during a battle.
This unit does not suffer any form of leadership loss and will never rout.

factionEffects.localised_description: Malakai Makaisson is an oathsworn Slayer as well as a gifted Engineer. His violent inventions may not last long, but they do make a colossal impact!

effects.description: Has access to Malakai's Adventures, enabling powerful War Machine and Artillery modifications and unique Legendary Battles
Starts campaign with control of Gotrek & Felix

item_set.description: Malakai Makaisson's formidable engineering skills are only as good as the means to carry them out; fortunately, science and Grungni are on his side!

backgroundSkills.localised_description: The mighty Airship of the oathsworn Slayer and gifted Engineer Malakai Makaisson carries him into the fray against those who would dare to wage war against Dawi-kind, and Gotrek in particular!

effects.description: Malakai's army has access to the Spirit of Grungni's Airship buildings
Missile strength: +20% for Artillery and Flying War Machine units
